panels.description:
#### _Warning(yellow)_
######   if one or more of the following conditions are true:
  * Idle CPU is less than 20%.
  * Load is higher than 5
  * Free memory is less than 1000 MiB;
  * Free space of "/" is less than 10 GiB;
#### _Critial(red)_
 ######   if one or more of the following conditions are true:
  + Idle CPU is less than 5%.
  + Load is higher than 10
  + Free space of "/" is less than 1 GiB;
  + Free memory is less than 100 MiB;

----
######     The system load is defined as the number of runnable tasks in the run-queue and is provided by many operating systems as a one minute average.
panels.title: $fqdn
